title: Did California Attempt to Force Parents to Accept a Curriculum That Teaches Children ‘There Are 15 Genders’?
subtitle: Conservative websites exploded into outrage at what they described as mandatory "indoctrination sessions" on gender identity for K-12 students.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2019, California education authorities formulated a policy that, if implemented, would force parents to allow their children to be taught that "there are 15 genders."
